thread.title: The Daily Heat Index: Milla Jovovich Gives Us a Preview of Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
thread.title_full: The Daily Heat Index: Milla Jovovich Gives Us a Preview of Resident Evil: The Final Chapter | Maxim

author: Maxim Staff
title: The Daily Heat Index: Milla Jovovich Gives Us a Preview of Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
text:
Here's your daily dose of what's heating up the internet:
Here's Your First Look at Alice
The end is near. After five films and hordes of undead later, Milla Jovovich will be packing heat one last time as Alice in Resident Evil: The Final Chapter . There's been some serious build-up for (supposed) last installment to the series, after production was halted following Jovovich's pop-up pregnancy. Regardless, the actress and Maxim favorite looks about ready to save the world in the new screenshot she posted on her Instagram.
Alice. #screenshot #residentevilthefinalchapter #residentevilmovie #capetowndiary
A photo posted by Milla Jovovich (@millajovovich) on Oct 11, 2015 at 11:51pm PDT
Tracy Morgan Stands Up Strong
Tracy Morgan is back , baby! The beloved comedian, who was critically injured in a car accident last year, returned to comedy Monday night with his first standup performance in 16 month at New York's Comedy Cellar.
My first time on stage in 16 Months at the #ComedyCellar ! Picking up the pieces! pic.twitter.com/T2uD2Zndot
â€” Tracy Morgan (@RealTracyMorgan) October 13, 2015
Turns Out Tatum Loves to Pose His Wife For Sexy Photos
As if he wasn't already great at just about everything, you can now throw photographer onto Channing Tatum 's resume. The Gambit star's wife, Jenna Dewan-Tatum , took to Instagram to show off some of the topless photos her husband grabbed of her while on a stay in Cabo. These drool-worthy shots are just more evidence that we need to celebrate Jenna much, much more often. Keep 'em coming.
A photo posted by Jenna Dewan Tatum (@jennaldewan) on Oct 8, 2015 at 11:37am PDT
